TXT_HOWTOJOIN_VALUE:
1. By playing on {{merchantCode}}, players will be awarded with chances to spin on {{merchantCode}} Wheel of Fortune.
2. The more games players play on {{merchantCode}}, the more spin will be rewarded to the players.
3. A FREE spin can be obtained when the green bar at the Wheel of Fortune is full.
TXT_TERMS&CONDITIONS_VALUE:
1. All bonuses offered are intended for recreation customers only. Accounts identified or suspected as non-recreational play type or wager style or collaboration between parties is not eligible for this promotion and are subject to have any awarded bonuses plus winnings to be revoked at the sole discretion of {{merchantCode}}.
2. Any bonuses and winnings are non-transferable to other accounts unless at the sole discretion of {{merchantCode}}.
3. {{merchantCode}} reserves the right to ask any customer to provide sufficient documentation for us to be satisfied in our absolute discretion as to the customer's identity prior to us crediting OR rewarding any bonus/prizes to him/her.
4. Should disputes arise in all matters relating to the awarding of the bonus and/or the Terms and Conditions in this promotion, the final decision shall lies with {{merchantCode}}. The decision made will be bind and shall not be subject to review or appeal by any customer or third party.
5. {{merchantCode}} reserves the exclusive right, exercisable in its sole discretion, to modify, alter, discontinue, cancel and/or void this game/promotion at anytime without any notice.
6. By participating in this game/promotion, the customer agrees to release, discharge and hold harmless, the Company, {{merchantCode}}, their legal representatives, their affiliates, subsidiaries, agencies and their respective officers, directors, employees and agents from any damage incurred or losses suffered or sustained, whether directly or indirectly related to this game/promotion.
